document_data.name: ''Amulet of Protection from Alignment Change''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''amulet of protection from alignment change''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[amulet]] that shielded the wearer from any [[magic]] designed to alter their core beliefs.
document_data.Description: A [[ruby]] stood as the centerpiece fror this talisman.
document_data.Powers: This amulet would function normally against items of weaker power, but against artifacts of great power it would only serve to slow down the alignment altering effects.
